從.definition: from; through; via; (bound form) to follow; (bound form) to obey; (bound form) to engage in (an activity); (used before a negative) ever; (bound form) (Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer; attendant; (bound form) (Taiwan pr. [zong4]) assistant; auxiliary; subordinate; (bound form) (Taiwan pr. [zong4]) related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor

從一而終.definition: faithful unto death (i.e. Confucian ban on widow remarrying)

從事.definition: to go for; to engage in; to undertake; to deal with; to handle; to do

從井救人.definition: to jump into a well to rescue sb else (idiom); fig. to help others at the risk to oneself

從來.definition: always; at all times; never (if used in negative sentence)

從來沒有.definition: there has never been; has never had; (before a verb) has never

從前.definition: previously; formerly; once upon a time

從動.definition: -driven (of mechanism, driven by a component); slave (wheel, pulley)

從吏.definition: minor official; to be an official

從命.definition: to obey an order; to comply; to do sb's bidding; to do as requested

從善如流.definition: readily following good advice (idiom); willing to accept other people's views

從善如登，從惡如崩.pinyin: cong2 shan4 ru2 deng1 , cong2 e4 ru2 beng1
從善如登，從惡如崩.definition: doing good is like a hard climb, doing evil is like an easy fall (idiom)

從天而降.definition: (idiom) to fall from the sky; (idiom) (fig.) to appear unexpectedly; to drop into one's lap

從容.definition: to go easy; unhurried; calm; Taiwan pr. [cong1 rong2]

從實招來.definition: to own up to the facts

從小.definition: from childhood; from a young age

從影.definition: to make movies; to be a movie actor (or actress)

從心所欲.definition: whatever you like; to do as one pleases

從戎.definition: to enlist; to be in the army

從政.definition: to be engaged in politics (esp. as a government official)

從早到晚.definition: from morning till night; from dawn to dusk; all day long

從業人員.definition: employee; person employed in a trade or profession

從業者.definition: people in the (aforementioned) industry; practitioner; industry professional

從此.definition: from now on; since then; henceforth

從江.definition: Congjiang county in Qiandongnan Miao and Dong autonomous prefecture 黔東南州|黔东南州[Qian2 dong1 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou

從江縣.definition: Congjiang county in Qiandongnan Miao and Dong autonomous prefecture 黔東南州|黔东南州[Qian2 dong1 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou

從眾.definition: to follow the crowd; to conform

從緩.definition: not to hurry; to procrastinate; to postpone

從良.definition: (of a slave or servant) to be given one's freedom; (of a prostitute) to marry and leave one's trade

從裡到外.definition: from the inside to the outside; through and through; thoroughly

從諫如流.definition: to follow admonition as natural flow (idiom); to accept criticism or correction (even from one's inferiors)

從軍.definition: to enlist; to serve in the army

從速.definition: (to do sth) with dispatch; as soon as possible

從長計議.definition: (idiom) to take one's time making a decision; to consider at length

從頭到尾.definition: from start to finish; from head to tail; the whole (thing)
